name: Dongaria Pratibandhee Manab Kalyan Sevashram

address: P/S: Nodakhali, Via: Birlapur, Near: Dongaria Chowrasta

briefDescription: The institution started functioning since the month of July, 2007. After relentless effort of many years, Sri Bhupal Mishra managed to get together 13 individuals. The institution got registered under Society registration Act in the month of February, 2008. During the year 2007-2008 the structural and organizational aspects were take care of. The aims, objectives and ideas of this institution were explained to the people belonging to different social levels and each of them was requested to become member of the advisory committee.
